yourAccount.title: Your Account

item.title: Your Account
item.description: View your account information and manage your settings.

privacyAndSafety.title: Privacy and Safety
privacyAndSafety.description: Control how Zispr uses your information and who can see your content.

item.title: Privacy and safety
item.description: Manage your privacy and safety settings.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Select the kinds of notifications you get about your activities, interests, and recommendations.

contentAndDisplay.title: Content and Display
contentAndDisplay.description: Manage your collections, accessibility, display, and languages.

collections.title: Collections
collections.description: Manage your collections of saved posts.

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose which language to use in Zispr.

emptyFollowing.title: Your timeline is a bit empty...
emptyFollowing.description: Find people to follow and see their posts here!

empty.title: Nothing to see here... yet
empty.description: When posts are made, they will appear here.

impressions.label: Impressions
impressions.tooltip: The number of times this post was seen.

engagements.label: Engagements
engagements.tooltip: Total number of times users have interacted with this post (likes, comments, retweets).

profileVisits.label: Profile visits
profileVisits.tooltip: The number of times your profile was visited from this post.

supporter.title: Become a Supporter
supporter.description: Support Zispr to get exclusive benefits and help the platform grow!
supporter.pageDescription: We are finalizing the details for you to support Zispr! Your contribution will be fundamental to keep the platform running and growing.

basic.name: Basic Supporter
basic.description: For those who want to take the first step and help the platform grow.

vip.name: VIP Supporter
vip.description: For enthusiasts who want an enhanced experience and early access.

patron.name: Patron Supporter
patron.description: For visionaries who believe in Zispr's full potential.
